data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: An update for our Mac players about the EA app for Windows
data.description: You may have seen some news about the new EA app for Windows, which will soon replace Origin as EA’s primary PC gaming destination. We understand you may be curious about what this means for you and your fellow Origin for Mac players.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: The all new EA app for Windows - EA’s new optimized PC platform has officia…
data.description: Today, we’re thrilled to announce that the EA app has officially left its open beta phase and will soon replace Origin as our primary PC platform.

data.title: Accessibility
data.header: Keeping Things Fair with EA anticheat System for PC
data.description: EA anticheat for PC, a new technology, lets us keep the game fair and protect you from other gamers using exploits.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: Electronic Arts Reports Q1 FY23 Financial Results
data.description: Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) today announced preliminary financial results for its first fiscal quarter ended June 30, 2022.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.description: Having helped to complete the transition with our new CFO, Blake Jorgensen’s last day with Electronic Arts is today, July 29. We appreciate everything he has done for our company, and we wish him all the best.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: An Update on Our Technology Teams
data.description: Technology is already at the center of every decision we make today, and as we look to the opportunities ahead of us, we want to weave it even more deeply into the fabric of how we operate.
